structure.unit: STATE AND FEDERAL HIGHWAYS -- LIMITED ACCESS FACILITIES -- TURNPIKES -- ROAD BONDS -- BILLBOARDS -- RECYCLERS

law.history: Repealed 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 80, sec. 5. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 76, sec. 2. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 175, sec. 2.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Billboard advertising prohibited -- Exception -- Removal required, when.
